traits.Spider Climb: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Web Sense: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
traits.Web Walker: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9+1d4 + 7 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.
